verses.text: \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w Melchisedec|strong="G3198"\w*, \w king|strong="G0935"\w* of \w Salem|strong="G4532"\w*, \w priest|strong="G2409"\w* of \w the|strong="G2316"\w* most \w high|strong="G5310"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, who \w met|strong="G4876"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* \w returning|strong="G5290"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w slaughter|strong="G2871"\w* of the \w kings|strong="G0935"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w blessed|strong="G2127"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*;

To \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* \w gave|strong="G3307"\w* a tenth \w part|strong="G1181"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*; \w first|strong="G4412"\w* being by \w interpretation|strong="G2059"\w* \w King|strong="G0935"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* after \w that|strong="G1899"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w King|strong="G0935"\w* of \w Salem|strong="G4532"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, \w King|strong="G0935"\w* of \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*;

Without \w father|strong="G0540"\w*, without \w mother|strong="G0282"\w*, without \w descent|strong="G0035"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w neither|strong="G3383"\w* \w beginning|strong="G0746"\w* of \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3383"\w* \w end|strong="G5056"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* made \w like|strong="G0871"\w* unto the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w abideth|strong="G3306"\w* a \w priest|strong="G2409"\w* \w continually|strong="G1336"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w consider|strong="G2334"\w* how \w great|strong="G4080"\w* this \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \add was\add*, unto \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* the \w patriarch|strong="G3966"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* the \w tenth|strong="G1181"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w spoils|strong="G0205"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w verily|strong="G3303"\w* they that \w are|strong="G2983"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w sons|strong="G5207"\w* of \w Levi|strong="G3017"\w*, who \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* the office of the \w priesthood|strong="G2405"\w*, \w have|strong="G2192"\w* a \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w* to take tithes \w of|strong="G0586"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w that|strong="G5124"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, \w of|strong="G0080"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w though|strong="G2539"\w* they come \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w loins|strong="G3751"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* he whose descent \w is|strong="G1075"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w counted|strong="G1075"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* received \w tithes|strong="G1183"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w blessed|strong="G2127"\w* him that \w had|strong="G2192"\w* the \w promises|strong="G1860"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w contradiction|strong="G0485"\w* the \w less|strong="G1640"\w* is \w blessed|strong="G2127"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w better|strong="G2909"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w here|strong="G5602"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* that \w die|strong="G0599"\w* \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w tithes|strong="G1181"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w he|strong="G3140"\w* \add receiveth them\add*, of whom it is \w witnessed|strong="G3140"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w liveth|strong="G2198"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* I may so \w say|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Levi|strong="G3017"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, who \w receiveth|strong="G2983"\w* \w tithes|strong="G1181"\w*, payed \w tithes|strong="G1183"\w* \w in|strong="G1223"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w loins|strong="G3751"\w* of his \w father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w Melchisedec|strong="G3198"\w* \w met|strong="G4876"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3303"\w* \w perfection|strong="G5050"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w Levitical|strong="G3020"\w* \w priesthood|strong="G2420"\w*, (\w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w under|strong="G1909"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* received the \w law|strong="G3549"\w*,) \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w further|strong="G2089"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w* \add was there\add* \w that|strong="G0450"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w priest|strong="G2409"\w* should \w rise|strong="G0450"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w order|strong="G5010"\w* of \w Melchisedec|strong="G3198"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* be \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w order|strong="G5010"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="G0002"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w priesthood|strong="G2420"\w* being \w changed|strong="G3346"\w*, there is \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w necessity|strong="G0318"\w* a \w change|strong="G3331"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G3348"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* are \w spoken|strong="G3004"\w* \w pertaineth|strong="G3348"\w* \w to|strong="G5443"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w tribe|strong="G5443"\w*, \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* gave \w attendance|strong="G4337"\w* at the \w altar|strong="G2379"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \add it is\add* \w evident|strong="G4271"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w sprang|strong="G0393"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Juda|strong="G2448"\w*; \w of|strong="G1519"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w tribe|strong="G5443"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w priesthood|strong="G2420"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* far \w more|strong="G4054"\w* \w evident|strong="G2612"\w*: for \w that|strong="G1487"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w similitude|strong="G3665"\w* of \w Melchisedec|strong="G3198"\w* there \w ariseth|strong="G0450"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w priest|strong="G2409"\w*,

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* is \w made|strong="G1096"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* of \w a|strong="G1785"\w* \w carnal|strong="G4559"\w* \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w power|strong="G1411"\w* of \w an|strong="G2222"\w* \w endless|strong="G0179"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he \w testifieth|strong="G3140"\w*, \w Thou|strong="G4771"\w* \add art\add* a \w priest|strong="G2409"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w order|strong="G5010"\w* of \w Melchisedec|strong="G3198"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* there \w is|strong="G1096"\w* \w verily|strong="G3303"\w* a \w disannulling|strong="G0115"\w* of the \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w* going \w before|strong="G4254"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w weakness|strong="G0772"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w unprofitableness|strong="G0512"\w* \w thereof|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w made|strong="G5048"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w perfect|strong="G5048"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* the bringing \w in|strong="G1898"\w* of \w a|strong="G1680"\w* \w better|strong="G2909"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \add did\add*; \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w which|strong="G3739"\w* we draw \w nigh|strong="G1448"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w*asmuch \w as|strong="G3745"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* an \w oath|strong="G3728"\w* \add he was made priest\add*:

(\w For|strong="G1063"\w* those \w priests|strong="G2409"\w* \w were|strong="G1526"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* an \w oath|strong="G3728"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* an \w oath|strong="G3728"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* him that \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, The \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w sware|strong="G3660"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G3338"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w repent|strong="G3338"\w*, \w Thou|strong="G4771"\w* \add art\add* a \w priest|strong="G2409"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w order|strong="G5010"\w* of \w Melchisedec|strong="G3198"\w*:)

\w By|strong="G2596"\w* so \w much|strong="G5118"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* a \w surety|strong="G1450"\w* of \w a|strong="G1242"\w* \w better|strong="G2909"\w* \w testament|strong="G1242"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G1526"\w* \w truly|strong="G3303"\w* \w were|strong="G1526"\w* \w many|strong="G4119"\w* \w priests|strong="G2409"\w*, \w because|strong="G1223"\w* they were not \w suffered|strong="G2967"\w* to \w continue|strong="G3887"\w* by reason of \w death|strong="G2288"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \add man\add*, \w because|strong="G1223"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w continueth|strong="G3306"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*, \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w an|strong="G2420"\w* \w unchangeable|strong="G0531"\w* \w priesthood|strong="G2420"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G3606"\w* he is \w able|strong="G1410"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* to \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \w them|strong="G3838"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w uttermost|strong="G3838"\w* that \w come|strong="G4334"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, seeing \w he|strong="G2198"\w* \w ever|strong="G3842"\w* \w liveth|strong="G2198"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* make \w intercession|strong="G1793"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* an high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* \w became|strong="G4241"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, \add who is\add* \w holy|strong="G3741"\w*, \w harmless|strong="G0172"\w*, \w undefiled|strong="G0283"\w*, \w separate|strong="G5563"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w sinners|strong="G0268"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w higher|strong="G5308"\w* than the \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w*;

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w needeth|strong="G0318"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w daily|strong="G2250"\w*, \w as|strong="G5618"\w* those high \w priests|strong="G0749"\w*, to offer \w up|strong="G0399"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="G2378"\w*, \w first|strong="G4386"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*, and \w then|strong="G1899"\w* for the \w peopleâ€™s|strong="G2992"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* he \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w once|strong="G2178"\w*, when he offered \w up|strong="G0399"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w maketh|strong="G2525"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* high \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* which \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w infirmity|strong="G0769"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of the \w oath|strong="G3728"\w*, which \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w since|strong="G3326"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \add maketh\add* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, who is \w consecrated|strong="G5048"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w evermore|strong="G0165"\w*.
